title: HamiltonCommunity
author: HamiltonCommunity
created_time: November 29, 2023, 05:41:12 PMLast edit: December 24, 2023, 05:16:43 PM by HamiltonCommunity
content: ★Website ★ TG Community ★ TikTok ★1. Project name Utopos Blockchain bounty campaign will last for 4 weeks and managed by Hamilton Management Service.2. By joining this campaign, all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.3. All participants must join/follow the OFFICIAL SOCIAL TikTok ACCOUNTS of Project name Utopos Blockchain below to get accepted.4. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any Campaign5.All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.6. All reports (TikTok) should be sent at the end of week on this thread.Proof of authenticationQuoteFormat:#Proof Of RegistrationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:Polygon Wallet Address:● TikTok:  100%Please submit your weekly report on this bounty threadWeek 1 : 29/11/2023 - 05/12/2023Week 2 : 06/12/2023 - 12/12/2023Week 3 : 13/12/2023 - 19/12/2023Week 4 : 20/12/2023 - 26/12/2023Rewards:1. Average quality -1 Stake2. Good quality - 2 Stake3. High quality - 3 Stake4. Excellent quality: 4 StakeRules:1. Every participant must follow Utopos Blockchain Project TikTok account 2. Videos need to be a minimum of 1 minutes in length & must have at least 500 TikTok followers Video contents must focus on a relevant topic project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.3. Video must be English others local Language is not accepted4 . All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Telegram group,5 . Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified6. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification7. Participants have to shoot 3 unique videos per week (maximum 1 video/day). (Tiktok)Note: TikTok Videos Minimum 500+ Views 8. Participants must use $UTOP #ETH#Crypto #BTC in every video.Weekly Report FormatQuoteTikTok Video CampaignTikTok/ Username:Spreadsheet No:Short Videos Url:1. …2. …3. …
